tbraille — Toilet/Figlet-like CLI tool
===

Installation and Usage
+++

.. code-block:: console

   $ pip install tbraille
   $ tbraille -f NotoMono-Regular -s 20 "¡Apagando las luces!"

   ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⣶⣶⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⣿⡇⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠛⢻⡇⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠛⢻⡇⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⢶⡶
   ⠀⠀⠿⠿⠀⠀⠀⣸⡟⢿⣇⠀⢸⣿⠟⠻⣿⡄⠀⠿⠛⠻⣿⡀⢠⣿⠛⢻⣿⠃⠀⠿⠛⠻⣿⡀⢸⣿⠟⠛⣿⡄⢠⣿⠟⠻⣿⡇⢠⣾⠟⠻⣷⡄⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⢸⡇⠀⠀⠀⠿⠛⠻⣿⡀⠀⣾⡟⠛⠿⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⢸⡇⠀⠀⢸⣿⠀⠀⣿⡇⢀⣾⠟⠛⠻⠃⢠⣾⠟⠛⣿⡆⠀⣾⡟⠛⠿⠀⠀⠀⢸⡇
   ⠀⠀⢰⡆⠀⠀⢠⣿⠷⠾⣿⡄⢸⣿⠀⠀⣿⡇⢰⣿⠛⢛⣿⡇⠈⣿⡶⠾⠟⠀⢰⣿⠛⢛⣿⡇⢸⣿⠀⠀⣿⡇⢸⣿⠀⠀⣿⡇⢸⣯⠀⠀⣿⡇⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⢸⡇⠀⠀⢰⣿⠛⢛⣿⡇⠀⠙⠻⢿⣶⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⢸⡇⠀⠀⢸⣿⠀⠀⣿⡇⢸⣿⡀⠀⠀⠀⢸⣿⠛⠛⠛⠃⠀⠙⠻⢿⣶⠀⠀⠀⠸⠇
   ⠀⠀⢸⡇⠀⠀⠾⠏⠀⠀⠹⠷⢸⣿⠷⠾⠿⠁⠘⠿⠶⠾⠿⠇⢠⣿⠿⠶⣶⡆⠘⠿⠶⠾⠿⠇⠸⠿⠀⠀⠿⠇⠈⠿⠷⠾⠿⠇⠈⠻⠷⠾⠟⠁⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠰⠶⠾⠷⠶⠆⠘⠿⠶⠾⠿⠇⠸⠷⠶⠾⠟⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠰⠶⠾⠷⠶⠆⠘⠿⠶⠾⠿⠇⠀⠻⠷⠶⠾⠇⠈⠻⠷⠶⠾⠇⠸⠷⠶⠾⠟⠀⠀⠀⠿⠿
   ⠀⠀⠾⠷⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠸⠿⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠸⠷⠤⠤⠾⠇


Use as library
+++

.. code-block:: python

   >>> from tbraille.board import Board
   >>> board = Board(10, 10)
   >>> for i in range(10):
   ...     board[i, i] = 1
   ...
   >>> print(str(board))
   ⠑⢄
   ⠀⠀⠑⢄
   ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠑
